title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: Aytoun, who has been described as " one of those Charlie- over-the-Water Scotchmen," lived for some time at No. I Inverleith Terrace, and died at No. i6 Great Stuart Street. He was professor of belles-lettres in the University, and he married Jane Emily Wil son, the youngest daughter of " Christopher North," in 1849.
